Pre-Game Insights: Experts predicted India as the favorites given their home advantage.
Both teams are eager to get their players some much-needed international T20 action to prepare for the T20 World Cup.
India has won the last two T20 series played against England and will be confident of winning this one as well on the back of the fantastic Test series win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather on 12th March '21 is likely to be very warm and sunny with an average temperature of 36 degrees celsius.
There is no chance of rain, which will make it suitable for batting.
The pitch is expected to be dusty and helpful to the spinners.
